umm not really...the colonization of the usa really didn't have that 
much effect on how canada became it's own country....it was more just 
the need for responsible gov't from the french and british and having a 
political deadlock....the only way they found to solve it was to write 
their own declaration....thus the beggining of canada...so you can't say 
we are canada because of the usa....
